welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Venecia, Costa Rica! Be prepared to fall in love with the charm and beauty of this city, known for its stunning natural landscapes and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fortuna Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fortuna Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Juan Santamaría International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to regional flights within Central America.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rio Frio Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rio Frio Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tobias Bolaños International Airport serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
